setup_script_description: sets focus on the combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'a'
task: open filled in collapsed combobox by typing character
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox without moving into the listbox popup.
output_assertions: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
Text of the automatically completed option ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
